import React from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { addcart , addfavorite } from '../../actions' function Item({ item }) { const dispatch = useDispatch() return (
{item.name}
{[...Array(item.rating)].map((elementInArray, i) => (
) )}

{item.price} THB

Stock : {item.quantity}

); } Item.propTypes = { item: PropTypes.object.isRequired, }; export default Item
